page.title: 02HOME LIFE
page.content: {HOME LIFE.}Most people live in private houses ranging from large farm houses to detached and semi_detached houses on the new estates.Older types of houses are along the main roads and near the town centre.People can rent houses.Most houses are brick built except the older wood and plaster ones.Almost everyone in Coggeshall has a garden.Life is made easier by labour saving equipment, washing machines, vacuum cleaners,foodmixers,irons,micro wave ovens,automatic kettles and toasters. We have both electricty and gas in the home.Beaumont House and Prail Court are old peoples homes, divided into individual flatlets with community rooms. They have a warden who is always there to supervise and help the elderly people .Coggeshalls antique shops attract customers from all over the world.
